HOME.CONVERT_TO_MP3_QUEUED: Track added to queue for convert to mp3
HOME.NO_DOWNLOAED_TRACKS: You have not downloaded tracks, start to download some
HOME.NO_SEARCH_RESULTS: There are no tracks for your searching

PLAYLISTS.LABEL: Playlists
PLAYLISTS.ALREADY_IN_PLAYLIST: Track is already in this playlist
PLAYLISTS.ADD_TRACK_KO: Error while adding track to playlist

PLAYLISTS.LABEL: Playlists
PLAYLISTS.ALREADY_IN_PLAYLIST: Track is already in this playlist
PLAYLISTS.NAME: Playlist name

REMOVE_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete playlist

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings

PUBLIC_SERVER.LABEL: Public server
PUBLIC_SERVER.DESC: Share your tracks and playlists to others peoples

NGROK.NOT_INSTALLED: You have to install ngrok tool on your system to enable this option
NGROK.MOBILE_APP: Download mobile app and scan your qr code
NGROK.AUTH_DESC_DISABLED: Enable authentication for your public server
NGROK.APP_KEY_HINT: Your local server will verify api key too
NGROK.URL_COPIED: Url has been copied to your clipboard

ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_103: Your account seems to be suspended
ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_10888: Max simultaneous ngrok clients reached, check if there is any ngrok process already running
ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_121: You have an outdated ngrok version, please update it
ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_205: Your account seems to be suspended
ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_225: You have reached max simultaneous requests
ON_STARTUP_ERRORS.ERR_NGROK_226: You have reached max requests per interval

SETTINGS.SAVE_DIRECTORY_HINT: Directory where all tracks will be saved
SETTINGS.MAX_SIM_DOWNLOADS_HINT: Max number of tracks that will be downloaded simultaneously
SETTINGS.MISSING_FFMPEG: You have to install ffmpeg tool on your system to enable this option
SETTINGS.REMOVE_WEBM_AFTER_CONVERTING: Remove webm files after converting to mp3 (disk space saving)
SETTINGS.MUST_ENABLE_CONVERT_TO_MP3: You have to enable "Convert to mp3" option before
SETTINGS.TELEGRAM_SHARE: Share downloaded tracks with your devices through telegram
SETTINGS.SAVE_KO: An error occured while saving settings
SETTINGS.MACOS_MISSING_CONVERT_TO_MP3_OPTIONS: Cannot playback on MacOs, you should enable "Convert to mp3" option

MANUAL_MODE.TRACK_ADD_KO: Error while adding track to downloads
